channel.title: Study on Pastel Cravings
channel.description: Recent content in Study on Pastel Cravings

item.title: Where to Study
item.description: For this special post, I’ve asked my co-bloggers to list me all their top coffee places to study and I’ve assembled the ones that was in common on our lists. Legend: ♥ = the bloggers’ favourites 1. La Finca Coffee & Office |♥Laura |♥Trang |ADDRESS: 1067 Rue de Bleury, Montréal, QC H2Z 1N1| Métro Place D’Armes A favourite of mine because of the accessibility by metro, the coziness of the place and the instagrammy worth of everyshot and every angle !
